title: Kix
alt: My parents sent me to several years of intensive Kix test prep.
transcript:
[Ponytail, Megan, and Cueball are standing around a whiteboard, holding markers. The whiteboard on easel reads:]
[in Large] Kix
[Underlined] Slogan ideas
Kid Tested, Mother...Selected
Perfected
Not notified
Watching helplessly
Infected
Consumed
Fucker
